promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive special chameleon fire-type pokemon with orange and black scales. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyrockameleon, a a massive special chameleon fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Hard Roll. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "chameleon", "fire" or "Pyrockameleon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, chameleon-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This flamboyant lizard thrives in harsh arid landscapes, using Hard Roll to evade threats. Can ignite its scales for protection.
